TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示 控件的列类型，它允许你自定义列中的控件布局。

span.span: Represents a column type for the control that allows you to customize the layout of controls in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件中的列类型来创建具有自定义控件布局的列。Use the column type in a control to create a column with a customized control layout. 您可以使用、 和属性分别为列的标题部分、脚注部分和 items 部分提供自定义外观。You can provide a custom appearance for the heading section, the footer section, and the items section of the column by using the , , and properties, respectively. 你还可以通过 设置属性来控制要编辑的项在对象中的显示方式。You can also control how an item being edited is displayed in the object by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类在控件中使用自定义布局来创建列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a column in the control with a custom layout. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 对象中选定的要进行编辑的项的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the item selected for editing in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示在 中进行编辑的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the item being edited in the .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制在对象中选择进行编辑的项的外观。 Use the property to control the appearance of the item selected for editing in the object. 外观是通过创建模板来指定的, 该模板定义如何在列中呈现项。The appearance is specified by creating a template that defines how the item is rendered in the column. 若要为选择进行编辑的项指定模板, 请先在`` ``元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 然后, 可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出用于控制该项外观的内容。You can then list the content that controls the appearance of the item between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本一样简单, 也可以通过在模板中嵌入其他控件来使内容更复杂。The content can be as simple as plain text, or it can be made more complex by embedding other controls in the template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制对象中正在编辑的项的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the item being edited in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]
